justification: This EA will install the Starlink Aviation System on United Airlines' Boeing 737-800 and 737-900ER. The Starlink Aviation System provides Wi-Fi over IEEE 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Wi-Fi connectivity and will include integration with the Panasonic ex1 System per these EA instructions, where applicable. Starlink will replace the existing Thales Gen 1 Ka Band Connectivity System, Viasat Gen 2 Broadband Connectivity System, or Viasat Gen 3 Broadband Connectivity System currently installed.
impact: A new panel will be installed in the overhead P5 panel. Three new circuit breakers will be installed on the P6-1 panel.
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"

P5 Panel Modification (Reference Starlink Drawing 06654102-576 Sheet 7 and  Detail H.

If the P5 panel does not already have a SATLINK switch installed, accomplish the following:

  • Ensure electrical power is removed from the simulator.
  • Gain access to the flight area P5 Panel.
  • Unlatch the P5 overhead panel and let the panel hang down.
  • Locate and remove the blanking plate currently installed where Sheet 7 shows the new switch assembly.
  • Modify the removed or new blanking plate to create the cutout of the Starlink Switch per 
  • Install switch assembly P/N LED-52-14-BA2-E32UH
    1. Slide the switch through the hole on the blanking plate 
    2. Insert the mounting sleeve over the back end of the switch, following orientation as shown in the installation drawing
    3. Carefully remove the switch cap from the housing
    4. Locate the two mounting lug screws inside the switch housing. Tighten screws until lugs hold the mounting sleeve in place. Torque to hand tight.
    5. Install the backing plate with the switch back into the P5 AFT overhead panel. Rotate the 4 quarter-turn fasteners clockwise to lock the panel in place.
","notes":""},{"instruction":"

P6 Panel Modification (Reference Drawing 06654102-627 Sheet 9.)

  • Gain access to the P6-1 circuit breaker panel
  • Install the circuit breakers below at the specified locations. Label the circuit breakers per Starlink Drawing 06654102-627 Figure 14 and FN11 :
Position Description Part Number Amps
C9 C9101   5A
C10 C9102   5A
C11 C9103   2A
  • Install front placards (Item 12) on the front of the P6-1 panel as shown on Starlink Drawing 06654102-627 Sheet 9 FIGURE 14. Label the circuit breakers per Starlink Drawing 06654102-627 FN10 
Position Upper Label Text Lower Label Test
C9 STARLINK 1 C9101
C10 STARLINK 2 C9102
C11 STLNK CNTL C9103
